resources.string: Tempo needs a couple of permissions to track your music listening in the background.

Tempo reads music notifications to detect what songs you\'re playing. This works with YouTube Music, Spotify, and other music apps.\n\nWe only read music-related notifications and never access your personal messages or other notifications.

To reliably track your music in the background, Tempo needs to be excluded from battery optimization.\n\nThis prevents Android from stopping Tempo when you\'re listening to music. Tempo is designed to use minimal battery.
